amendment.description: To require a protocol on media coverage of the return to the United States of the remains of members of the Armed Forces who die overseas.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3291 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 39 - 54. Record Vote Number: 132.

action.text: Amendment SA 3291 proposed by Senator Lautenberg. (consideration: CR S7034-7035) To require a protocol on media coverage of the return to the United States of the remains of members of the Armed Forces who die overseas.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3291 proposed by Senator Lautenberg.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3291 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 39 - 54. Record Vote Number: 132.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3291 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 39 - 54. Record Vote Number: 132.
